testcase.name: Create Single User
testcase.system-out: Given url StoreBaseURL .................................................... passed * def query = {"id":11,"username":"Jack123","firstName":"Jack","lastName":"Sparrow","email":"jacksparrow@gmail.com","password":"Jack@1234","phone":"9003061057","userStatus":0} . passed And request query ......................................................... passed * match query == {id:'#number',"username":"#string","firstName":"#string","lastName":"#string","email":"#string","password":"#string","phone":"#string","userStatus":'#number'} . passed And method POST ........................................................... passed Then print response ....................................................... passed And match response.code == 200 ............................................ passed And match response.message == '#string' ................................... passed And match response.type == '#present' ..................................... passed * def utils = Java.type('com.demo.custom.CustomFunctions') ................ passed * def date = responseHeaders['Date'] ...................................... passed * def datematch = utils.matchDate(date) ................................... passed * print 'Date Match Status',datematch ..................................... passed And match datematch == false .............................................. passed

testcase.name: Create Multiple Users using json array
testcase.system-out: Given url StoreBaseURL .................................................... passed * def query = {"id":11,"username":"Jack123","firstName":"Jack","lastName":"Sparrow","email":"jacksparrow@gmail.com","password":"Jack@1234","phone":"9003061057","userStatus":0} . passed And request query ......................................................... passed * match query == {id:'#number',"username":"#string","firstName":"#string","lastName":"#string","email":"#string","password":"#string","phone":"#string","userStatus":'#number'} . passed And method POST ........................................................... passed Then print response ....................................................... passed And match response.code == 200 ............................................ passed And match response.message == '#string' ................................... passed And match response.type == '#present' ..................................... passed * def utils = Java.type('com.demo.custom.CustomFunctions') ................ passed * def date = responseHeaders['Date'] ...................................... passed * def datematch = utils.matchDate(date) ................................... passed * print 'Date Match Status',datematch ..................................... passed And match datematch == false .............................................. passed Given url StoreBaseURL .................................................... passed And path '/createWithArray' ............................................... passed * def userdata = read('com/demo/data/userdata.json') ...................... passed And request userdata ...................................................... passed And method POST ........................................................... passed Then print response ....................................................... passed And match response.code == 200 ............................................ passed And match response.type == '#notnull' ..................................... passed
